com.analog.lyric.options

Interface IOptionConfigurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDiscreteDirectSampler, IGenericSampler, IMCMCSampler, IProposalKernel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericSampler, CDFSampler, CircularNormalProposalKernel, MHSampler, NormalProposalKernel, SliceSampler, SuwaTodoSampler, UniformDiscreteProposalKernel

    public interface IOptionConfigurable
    Interface for non-option-holder objects that can be configured using options.

    Since:
    0.07

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configureFromOptions(IOptionHolder optionHolder)
      Configures state/parameters of object from option values obtained through given option holder.
      java.util.List<Option<?>> getOptionConfiguration(java.util.List<Option<?>> list)
      Returns a list of Option objects describing the configurable settings of this object.

    • Method Detail

      • configureFromOptions

        void configureFromOptions(IOptionHolder optionHolder)
        Configures state/parameters of object from option values obtained through given option holder.

        Parameters:
        optionHolder - is the option holder that can be used to look up option settings.

        Since:
        0.07

      • getOptionConfiguration

        @Nullable
java.util.List<Option<?>> getOptionConfiguration(@Nullable
                                                        java.util.List<Option<?>> list)
        Returns a list of Option objects describing the configurable settings of this object.

        Parameters:
        list - if non-null, options should be appended to this list. Otherwise a new list will be created.
        Returns:
        list if non-null, otherwise returns a newly constructed mutable list containing option objects that describe the settings of this object that can be controlled by options. May return null if no options pertain to this object (but only if list was null!).
        Since:
        0.07
